ConfigParam.Description: translate("#LDS#Requester must authenticate in Active Directory before submitting the shopping cart")

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: translate("#LDS#One or more products in your shopping cart require that you accept the terms of use before proceeding.")

DataTableFKView.ViewFKWhereClause: -- ignore requests made for other employees uid_personinserted = uid_personordered
uid_accproduct in (select uid_accproduct from shoppingcartitem where uid_personordered = uid_personinserted)

Function.Name: DisplayTermsOfUse()
Function.Expression: (0 < select count() from QERTermsOfUse) AND ( 0 = from ShoppingCartItem select count() where MethodName like 'Unsubscribe%' AND UID_AccProduct in (from AccProduct select UID_AccProduct where NOT IsNullOrEmpty(UID_QERTermsOfUse)) )

Function.Name: GetTermsOfUseAcceptText(string termsOfUseDisplay)
Function.Expression: translate("#LDS#The requester has accepted the terms of use: {0}", termsOfUseDisplay)
